name: Light Cycles - Eight player multi-play
description:
Light cycles is our brand new 8 player game for your iPad.

You can have up to 8 players on one iPad, or play 7 computer players.

Ride your light cycle, controlling it with left and right control panel. As you ride, your cycle leaves a deadly light trails.

A very fun game, avoid the other players trails while trying to trap them yourself.

A great game for playing with your friends, if you have enough of them.
